hackathon-description-text: IMPORTANT: This year's demos will be shown on a projector, looping through a YouTube playlist. Please attach a YouTube link of a screencast of your hack. You will want to include your name as text somewhere in the video because we'll be showing them in a constant loop without sound. The demos are just to get people interested in the projects so they can talk to their creators around the room. Bring your laptop if you can to show live demos to interested people!
hackathon-rules:
1. No rules
2. Please keep your video to under 3 mins
3. Try and be as SFW as possible plz
4. Okay there are two rules but for the most part, see: 1.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We aren't judging demos, of course!

hackathon-description-header: Demos from HackNY Alumni at our Reunion
